EmailTemplate.name: DIRECT - Internal Notification - CMG Managed Property
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: Please contact your customer - {!Opportunity.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.00N1a000006cTtW},
Congratulations on a new Palmetto Sale!
Please note this home is located within a Community Management Group (CMG) managed property. CMG will not correspond with Palmetto. They require all communication and requests come directly from the homeowner.
Please let your customer know that they will have to request the application from CMG and be responsible for all followup. Palmetto will continue to submit on their behalf and pay reasonable application fees.
Opportunity Link - {!Opportunity.Link}
